'''Largo Baggins''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Largo was a son of [[Balbo Baggins]]. He married [[Tanta Hornblower]], and had one child, [[Fosco Baggins|Fosco]].<ref name=tree>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>

The last years of his life the Shire suffered from the [[Fell Winter]]<ref>{{App|TA}}</ref> and around that time he lost his elder brother [[Ponto Baggins I|Ponto]]. Largo died the next year, as did his younger sister [[Lily Baggins|Lily]].<ref name=tree/>
